thread.section_title: BikeTiresDirect.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BikeTiresDirect.com | biketiresdirect.com
thread.title: John Tuss

author: John Tuss
title: John Tuss
text:
I get everything here, and if they don't carry what I was going to get, I get what they sell instead. Great deals. I check the website almost daily, and get unexpectedly great deals.
I'm fortunate enough to live in Portland where the shop is located, so I just stop by on my bike commute home, and pick up my order. I save even more by not having to have my items shipped.
